thread.title: Rolling world stock sell-off runs to $4 trillion

title: Rolling world stock sell-off runs to $4 trillion
text:
Rolling world stock sell-off runs to $4 trillion 5:11pm GMT - 01:49 
World stock markets nosedive for a fourth day running, having seen $4 trillion wiped off from what just eight days ago had been record-high values. David Pollard reports ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
World stock markets nosedive for a fourth day running, having seen $4 trillion wiped off from what just eight days ago had been record-high values. David Pollard reports Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2BIDMOq
